Radial nor Mirror symmetry is working and 1 will go on the bottom of the left wing but then on the top of the right...... Just watch. Make sure to read the description on the video.
Have you made sure to place the wings, too, using mirror symmetry? Once a symmetry mode for a part is decided, its children will always use that same mode.
